law.catch_line: The Board of Trustees may deny membership in the Teachers' Pension System to, or make membership opt...
law.text:
The Board of Trustees may deny membership in the Teachers' Pension System to, or make membership optional for, any class of individuals described in § 23-206(a) of this subtitle whose:
compensation is paid only partly by the State; or
employment is temporary or on other than a yearly basis.
